text: Ra allahakai puja gara ra usako sathama aru kasaiko sajhedari nagara ra amaâ€“babusamga sam'manapurna vyavahara gara ra najikaka natedara, anathaharu ra gariba asahayaharu ra natedara chimekiharu ra gaira natedari chimekiharu ra sangai uthbas garne sathiharu ra batuvaharu ra jo timro svamitvama chan, sabaiko upakara gara. Nihsandeha allahale ghamandi tatha mithya abhimana garneharula'i ruca'umdainan
